content: finished size **skill level ** easy this pattern is easy to knit the pattern uses only knit stitches you will need to know how to cast on stitches knit confidently read a knitting pattern bind off stitches and weave in ends the pattern includes details about seaming the blanket panels this pattern uses standard u s knitting terms written pattern with row by row instructions 1 https //bit ly/howtoplanatempblanketknittingproject 2 https //bit ly/5410studioravelry 3 https //bit ly/howtoplanatempblanketknittingproject
